subject: Madrid Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Rafael Nadal won his fifth tournament since returning in February from a knee injury, defeating Stanislas Wawrinka in front of an adoring crowd and on his cherished clay surface at the Madrid Open.
snippet: Rafael Nadal won his fifth tournament since returning in February from a knee injury, defeating Stanislas Wawrinka in front of an adoring crowd and on his cherished clay surface at the Madrid Open.
